sn34.46:0.3: Four on Subjects and Projection, Etc.
sn34.46:1.2: “One meditator is skilled in the mindfulness meditation subjects for immersion but not in projecting the mind purified by immersion. …”
sn34.47:1.1: “One meditator is skilled in the mindfulness meditation subjects for immersion but not in practicing carefully for it. …”
sn34.47:1.2: (These four discourses should be told in full as the previous set.)
sn34.48:1.1: “One meditator is skilled in the mindfulness meditation subjects for immersion but not in practicing persistently for it. …”
sn34.49:1.1: “One meditator is skilled in the mindfulness meditation subjects for immersion but not in doing what’s conducive to it. …”
